::Spears::

She sat in her room, alone.  She reached up and tried to take off the 
chip from her neck.  It shocked her hand and she shook with 
pain.  "That was not a good idea." she said to herself.  She layed 
down on the bed and stared at the ceiling.  The chip controled her 
motions, not her thoughts.  But is was slowly starting to over ride 
that too.  She tried to think of how to get her and Striker out of 
thier situation.  But  no solutions came to mind.  

She couldn't help but feel like she had let her one true friend, and 
the only bot she ever really cared for, down.  She could only lie 
there and close her eyes as the tears rolled down her cheeks.
